amendatorysection.catchline: School crossing zone; overtaking and passing prohibited; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: It is unlawful for a person operating a motor vehicle to overtake and pass another vehicle in a school crossing zone in which the roadway has only one lane of traffic in each direction. Any person convicted of overtaking and passing another vehicle in a school crossing zone is guilty of a traffic infraction and shall be fined not more than two hundred dollars for the first offense and at least two hundred dollars but not more than four hundred dollars for a second or subsequent offense.
